name: Zulu Defender
description:
Install instructions

1-download the installation file.

2-run the installation file

3-read and follow the procedure given during installation (you may require installforge to run the installation. Don't worry, installforge is like installshield and its 100% free to use

please note : your saved game is the file named "Zulu Defender.exe.bgeconf" located in the installation path you specified when installing the game.
